repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: On the front cover, there is a note providing the manuscript details. It mentions the manuscript's name bhaṭṭabhāskarabhāṣya 1st Aṣṭaka and the script Granth and number of pages and lines per folio, '257 p 7 l'. First blank folio has title and further information in the right margin: Vidyāraṇyabhāṣyam aśvamedham kāṭhakam bhaṭṭabhāskarīyam prathama. In the right margin of the second blank folio is written "bhaṭṭabhāskaryam ṃotalaṣṭakam bhāṣya". The margins are broken so that the height of the folio at the margin is shorter than the height of the remaining folio.

msItem.title: Yajurvedabhāṣya
msItem.author: Bhaṭṭa Bhāskara
msItem.incipit:
1v 1 vande vedāmarataruṃ auśākho vaśobhitam . svadvāvavargaviladaṃ vibudhairūpasecitaṃ . vande niśreyasopayayaṃ ma(bṛ?)smātmanyodhīte . vedāya sarva
1v 2 gurave śivāya namo namaḥ .. īśānasarvavidyānāṃ būtānāṃ īśvaraḥ varaḥ . (vyāpnu?)sarvadāyuṣmān śabdabhrahmatanuśśivaḥ .. atha pāraśkṣudātanukramiṣyāmaḥ .
msItem.explicit: 129v 5 āgniṣṭomamudaniya(ma)nte āhariti antessarvadevatātvāt saṃpratiṣṭhito bhavati . santiṣṭhante rājasūyaḥ . ītyaṣṭame daśamonuvākaḥ .
msItem.finalRubric: 129v 5 āgniṣṭomamudaniya(ma)nte āhariti antessarvadevatātvāt saṃpratiṣṭhito bhavati . santiṣṭhante rājasūyaḥ . ītyaṣṭame daśamonuvākaḥ . samāptaśca prapāṭhakaḥ . 129v 6 iti bhaṭṭabhāskaramiśraviracite yajurvedabhāṣye pāraṣkudreṣu prathamamaṣṭakam samāptam . .. hariḥ oṃ śūbamastu .. gūrubhyo namaḥ 129v 7 gap due to broken folio kṣayavarṣaṃ ava (gap of 1 syllable due to broken folio) nimāsmayati vā nathe nivṛtataṇana (illegible 2 syllables.) kasha (1 illegible syllable) vvāndhyāputra kasturiretvatau lekha (gap of one letter) (ititya daudanam [Unclear].) bhaṭṭabhāskara (gap due to broken folio).

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil letter numerals in the left margin.

listBibl.bibl: The Taittirīya saṃhitā of kṛṣṇayajurveda with the commentary of bhaṭṭabhāskaramiśra Vols 1-3 , kāṇḍa 1.1–2.2 Edi. By A Mahādevaśāstri and Panditaratna K Raghavacarya Government Oriental Library Series, Bibliothica Sanskrit Mysore Government Branch press 1894-1895 .(Vols are available on archive org.)

encodingDesc.p: Spaces are added to separate words.
